text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Perfect. Another ill informed @GOP #dumbshit. ~330,000,000 US population, > 660,000 confirmed positive #COVID19 cases and you’re bragging about “3.5 million tests completed”? Math is obviously a second language for @PressSec. Not impressive.
